flawed_nl_solution:
They'll celebrate their 20th wedding anniversary in 2025 which means they got married in 2025-20 = <<2025-20=2050>>2050
They started dating 3 years before they got married in 2050 which means they started dating in 2050-3 = 2047
And they met 2 years before they started dating which means they met in 2047-2 = 2045

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2005, not 2050. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
